trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKME103_04421_SEQ_00<tab>Hythlodaeus is looking you up and down.
TEXT_AKTKME103_04421_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Hythlodaeus.
TEXT_AKTKME103_04421_TODO_01<tab>Use the aetheric rope to capture weakened petaloudai.
TEXT_AKTKME103_04421_TODO_02<tab>Deliver the petaloudai to Hythlodaeus.
TEXT_AKTKME103_04421_EMETSELCH_000_000<tab>In case you didn't know, it's rude to stare. Stop.
TEXT_AKTKME103_04421_HYTHLODAEUS_000_010<tab>Now then, our friend Hermes. Aside from overseeing the facility, he also conducts his own research.
TEXT_AKTKME103_04421_HYTHLODAEUS_000_011<tab>Chances are he will be at the main observation hub, so let us seek him out there first.
TEXT_AKTKME103_04421_HYTHLODAEUS_000_012<tab>Attired as you are, however, you stand out a little too much. Our dear Emet-Selch wishes to keep a low profile for his errand, so...
TEXT_AKTKME103_04421_HYTHLODAEUS_000_013<tab>Do you know how to make a robe? The basic concept will do.
TEXT_AKTKME103_04421_HYTHLODAEUS_000_014<tab>No? In that case, Emet-Selch─
TEXT_AKTKME103_04421_EMETSELCH_000_015<tab>No. Your whim, your responsibility. You're getting not another thimble of aether out of me.
TEXT_AKTKME103_04421_HYTHLODAEUS_000_016<tab><sigh> The way he scrimps sometimes, you'd think he <var 1A 02 /var>wasn't<var 1A 01 /var> a nigh-bottomless font of magic...
TEXT_AKTKME103_04421_HYTHLODAEUS_000_017<tab>Very well, I shall make the robe, but perhaps you can assist. Come, let us search for the requisite material.
TEXT_AKTKME103_04421_EMETSELCH_000_020<tab>No means no. Just be grateful I'm even willing to wait.
TEXT_AKTKME103_04421_HYTHLODAEUS_000_030<tab>Yes, these creatures should suffice.
TEXT_AKTKME103_04421_HYTHLODAEUS_000_031<tab>An aetheric rope. I want you to use it to capture, shall we say, two petaloudai.
TEXT_AKTKME103_04421_HYTHLODAEUS_000_032<tab>There are three species here, I believe. Any two different kinds should serve.
TEXT_AKTKME103_04421_HYTHLODAEUS_000_033<tab>Now, I should mention that the strength of the rope is tied─no pun intended─to the strength of its user.
TEXT_AKTKME103_04421_HYTHLODAEUS_000_034<tab>As your aether is still thin compared to ours, you'll need to weaken the petaloudai first. Good luck!
TEXT_AKTKME103_04421_HYTHLODAEUS_000_040<tab>Remember, it's a pair of petaloudai we require. Any two different kinds should serve.
TEXT_AKTKME103_04421_HYTHLODAEUS_000_050<tab>You've caught the petaloudai? Come, come, let us see.
TEXT_AKTKME103_04421_HYTHLODAEUS_000_051<tab>Yes, these fine fellows will do nicely. And now for a spot of reversion...
TEXT_AKTKME103_04421_HYTHLODAEUS_000_052<tab>...There! It's ready!
TEXT_AKTKME103_04421_HYTHLODAEUS_000_053<tab>It's nothing fancy, but then we're trying <var 1A 02 /var>not<var 1A 01 /var> to stand out. Try it on for size.
TEXT_AKTKME103_04421_Q1_000_054<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_AKTKME103_04421_A1_000_055<tab>You turn living beings into clothing? Just like that?
TEXT_AKTKME103_04421_A1_000_056<tab>Won't someone be angry with us for using those creatures?
TEXT_AKTKME103_04421_HYTHLODAEUS_000_057<tab>Well, not <var 1A 02 /var>just<var 1A 01 /var> like that. You need to revert them to their constituent aether first.

TEXT_AKTKME103_04421_HYTHLODAEUS_000_058<tab>Lest you wonder why I asked for two species, it is due to the difference in their aetheric balance. Blending them allows us to produce garb with superior aetheric stability.
TEXT_AKTKME103_04421_HYTHLODAEUS_000_059<tab>Oh, it's fine, there's no one around to tell us off. And besides, we can always make more petaloudai. They need only a tiny amount of aether.
TEXT_AKTKME103_04421_HYTHLODAEUS_000_060<tab>It may take some effort to get the form and composition right, but anyone familiar with the concept should be able to manage.
TEXT_AKTKME103_04421_EMETSELCH_000_061<tab>Well and good to disguise <var 1A 02 /var>and<var 1A 01 /var> educate it, but it won't fool anyone who can see worth a damn.
TEXT_AKTKME103_04421_HYTHLODAEUS_000_062<tab>Fair point, but at the very least it should spare you unwanted attention from casual observers.
TEXT_AKTKME103_04421_HYTHLODAEUS_000_063<tab>Emet-Selch speaks true. Even dressed like us, your unusual nature will be plain to those who think to look.

TEXT_AKTKME103_04421_HYTHLODAEUS_000_064<tab>Should someone question your presence, don't make up excuses, much less try to explain what you actually are. No, best to simply say that you're a familiar.
TEXT_AKTKME103_04421_HYTHLODAEUS_000_065<tab>The question is <var 1A 02 /var>whose<var 1A 01 /var>...

TEXT_AKTKME103_04421_HYTHLODAEUS_000_066<tab>Ah, of course─Azem's. If you say you belong to <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var>, people will give you the benefit of the doubt for any and all outlandish behavior.
TEXT_AKTKME103_04421_EMETSELCH_000_067<tab>Exploiting our associate's absence?

TEXT_AKTKME103_04421_HYTHLODAEUS_000_068<tab>For lack of <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> presence, absolutely. Were <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> here, <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var>'d have been the first to propose the idea─and you know it.
TEXT_AKTKME103_04421_HYTHLODAEUS_000_069<tab>With that, your story is settled. Let us continue with our errand!
